title: Transform Your Life & Live At Tower 801!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Tower 801 apartment homes is your new favorite destination in the city – and for good reason!
This trendy Seattle, Washington, hot spot was built for a leveled-up lifestyle.
Play in the city, make moves at the office downtown, or catch your next class at Seattle University.
Then, come home to a seriously stylish – and upgraded – pet-friendly studio, one, two, or three bedroom apartment in the Pike/Pine corridor.
This is Seattle living as it should be – so keep scrolling and say hello to your new downtown address.
Maximum of two pets per apartmentDOG BREEDS:

Restricted breeds that may not visit or be maintained in the Leased Premises include, but are not limited to, the following: Pit Bulls, Rottweilers, Presa Canario, German Shepherds, Huskies, Malamutes Dobermans, Chowchows St. Bernard’s, Great Danes, Akitas, Terriers (Staffordshire), American BullDog, Karelian Bear Dog, and any hybrid or mixed breed of one of the aforementioned breedsEXOTIC ANIMALS:

Restricted animals that may not visit or be maintained in the Leased Premises include, but are not limited to, the following: Reptiles (snakes, iguanas),Ferrets, Skunks, Raccoons, Squirrels, Rabbits, Birds (parrots, cockatiels, macaws).Please Contact office for additional information.
Garage parking is with Republic parking <URL>) and will cost $225 a month.
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven, In unit Washer/Dryer, Ice Machine
Fitness center, Sauna, Community Room, Court Yard Area
Hardwood floor, Granite countertop, Stainless Appliances
